createTable.remarks: 通知通告用户接收阅读表

changeSet.author: admin
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `to_notify` CHANGE COLUMN `GUID` `GUID` VARCHAR(38) NOT NULL COMMENT '主键' COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci' FIRST 主键

column.name: NAME
